title: Relates to the salaries of full-time city court judges in certain cities
summary: Relates to the salaries of full-time city court judges in certain cities.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3216

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  SCHROEDER  --  read once and referred to the
         Committee on Judiciary

       AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to the salary of a  full-
         time  city  court  judge in the cities of Lackawanna, North Tonawanda,
         and Tonawanda

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Section 221-i of the judiciary law, as amended by chapter
    2  493 of the laws of 2006, is amended to read as follows:
    3    S 221-i. Salary of judges of the city courts outside the city  of  New
    4  York.  The  annual salary of each judge of a city court outside the city
    5  of New York shall be as follows (where this section  provides  different
    6  salaries for judicial positions on the same court having the same title,
    7  the  greater  salary  shall be paid the person holding the position paid
    8  the greater salary on the day immediately preceding  the  day  on  which
    9  such salaries took effect):

   10           City                Title

   11  (1)      Albany              City Court Judge (FT)      113,900
   12  (2)      Albany              City Court Judge            54,400
   13  (3)      Amsterdam           City Court Judge (FT)      108,800
   14  (4)      Amsterdam           City Court Judge            27,200
   15  (5)      Auburn              City Court Judge (FT)      108,800
   16  (6)      Auburn              City Court Judge            27,200
   17  (7)      Batavia             City Court Judge (FT)      108,800
   18  (8)      Batavia             City Court Judge            27,200
   19  (9)      Beacon              City Court Judge (FT)      108,800
   20  (10)     Beacon              City Court Judge            27,200
   21  (11)     Binghamton          City Court Judge (FT)      108,800
   22  (12)     Binghamton          City Court Judge            54,400

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06759-01-1
